item.title: 特朗普计划征收 50%的进口关税，伦敦期铜下跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示计划对进口商品征收 50%的关税后，伦敦基准期铜下跌，此举可能会引发全球金属市场的进一步动荡。【原文：Benchmark copper futures fell in London after US President Donald Trump said he planned to implement a 50% tariff on imports, a move that’s likely to spark further upheaval global metal markets.】

item.title: 美国延长谈判缓解贸易担忧，黄金维持跌势
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，8月份开始征收所谓 "对等 "关税的新期限不会推迟，预计各国将利用延长的窗口期继续与美国谈判，此后黄金保持跌势。【原文：Gold held a decline after President Donald Trump said the new August deadline for the start of so-called “reciprocal” tariffs won’t be delayed, with nations expected to use the extended window to continue negotiating with the US.】

item.title: 行业报告指出美国库存增加，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 由于交易商权衡了美国原油库存膨胀的迹象和唐纳德-特朗普总统关税制度的影响，石油价格趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied as traders weighed signs of swelling US crude stockpiles and the fallout from President Donald Trump’s tariff regime.】

item.title: 香港银行借贷上升或预示流动性收紧
item.description: 香港银行的隔夜借款跃升至近五个月来的最高点，这表明为支持本币而采取的一系列干预措施可能正在货币市场上产生预期效果。【原文：Overnight borrowing by Hong Kong banks jumped to the highest in almost five months, a sign that a series of interventions to bolster the local currency may be having a desired effect on the money market.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行将更新研究战略以支持决策
item.description: 澳大利亚央行副行长安德鲁-豪瑟（Andrew Hauser）在储备银行做出维持利率不变的决定令投资者和经济学家震惊一天后表示，澳大利亚央行打算更新其研究战略，以支持决策。【原文：Australia’s central bank intends to refresh its research strategy to support policymaking, Deputy Governor Andrew Hauser said, a day after the Reserve Bank shocked investors and economists with an unchanged interest-rate decision.】

item.title: 晨星认为，尽管有关税，韩国股票仍是新兴市场的最佳选择
item.description: 晨星财富（Morningstar Wealth）的一位基金经理正在抛售中国和日本股票，以增加对韩国股票的投资。【原文：A fund manager at Morningstar Wealth is selling Chinese and Japanese equities to increase exposure to South Korea, which he’s betting on to provide the best returns in both emerging and Asian markets over the next decade.】

item.title: 市场综述：特朗普加倍强硬，亚洲市场开盘谨慎
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）排除了延长其 8 月关税期限的可能性，华尔街股市盘中表现低迷，亚洲股市开盘低迷。美国总统呼吁对进口商品征收 50%的关税后，美国铜价大涨。【原文：Asia stocks are poised for a subdued open after a lackluster session on Wall Street as Donald Trump ruled out extending his August tariff deadline. US copper prices surged after the president called for a 50% levy on imports.】

item.title: Altice 美国子公司 Lightpath 寻求出售光纤网络 ABS
item.description: Cablevision Lightpath LLC 是一家光纤通信服务提供商，由 Altice USA Inc.【原文：Cablevision Lightpath LLC, a fiber optic communications services provider that is majority controlled by Altice USA Inc., is looking to sell as much as $2.8 billion of asset-backed securities.】

item.title: 苹果供应商透镜技术公司斥资 6.07 亿美元在香港上市
item.description: 为苹果公司 iPhone 生产触摸屏盖板的中国制造商朗思科技股份有限公司（Lens Technology Co.【原文：Lens Technology Co., a Chinese manufacturer of touch-screen covers for Apple Inc.’s iPhone, will begin trading in Hong Kong on Wednesday after its HK$4.8 billion ($607 million) debut stock offering in the city.】

item.title: Baupost 支持的瓷砖进口商申请破产，寻求出售
item.description: 销售瓷砖和石材地板的 Mosaic Cos.公司申请破产，并计划出售其业务，因为该公司的主要支持者--投资巨头 Baupost 集团的附属公司--无法帮助该公司解决始于 Covid-19 大流行期间的进口问题。【原文：Mosaic Cos., which sells tile and stone flooring, filed for bankruptcy with plans to sell its operations after the company’s main backer, an affiliate of investment giant Baupost Group, was unable to help the business navigate import problems that began during the Covid-19 pandemic.】

item.title: <strong>中国的人工智能大计划：在沙漠中</strong
item.description:
彭博社的一项调查发现，中国正在偏远的新疆地区建设数据中心，以助推其人工智能雄心—；并希望购买 11.5 万台 Nvidia 芯片来为这些数据中心提供动力

。【原文：

A Bloomberg investigation finds China is building data centers in the remote Xinjiang region to fuel its AI ambitions — and looking to buy 115,000 Nvidia chips to power them.

】

item.title: 特朗普的铜关税威胁已在提高工厂成本
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对铜征收高额进口关税的计划已经导致美国工厂成本飙升，周二纽约期货交易价格比其他全球基准高出 25%。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s plans to place hefty import tariffs on copper have already caused a spike in costs for American factories, with New York futures trading 25% higher than other global benchmarks on Tuesday.】

item.title: OpenAI首席执行官阿尔特曼期待与扎克伯格在偷猎问题上重逢
item.description: 自从 Meta Platforms Inc. 首席执行官挖走 OpenAI 的一些顶级工程师后，OpenAI 首席执行官萨姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）还没有与马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）交谈过，但他预计将在本周的太阳谷会议上会面，并 "期待着会面"。【原文：OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman hasn’t yet spoken to Mark Zuckerberg since the Meta Platforms Inc. chief executive officer poached some of OpenAI’s top engineers, but he’s anticipating a meeting at the Sun Valley conference this week and “looking forward to it.”】

item.title: 中国希望为沙漠中的数据中心提供 115,000 片 Nvidia 芯片
item.description: 完整体验请访问中国需要11.5万片Nvidia芯片为沙漠中的数据中心供电【原文：For the full experience visit: China Wants 115,000 Nvidia Chips to Power Data Centers in the Desert】

item.title: 管理 750 亿澳元资金的澳大利亚养老金新增私募股权投资基金
item.description: 澳大利亚美世养老金有限公司（Mercer Superannuation Australia Ltd.）将首次在其默认养老金选项中增加私募股权投资，加入越来越多的退休基金的行列，采用这种策略来实现持股多样化。【原文：Mercer Superannuation Australia Ltd. will add private equity to its default pension options for the first time, joining a growing number of retirement funds in embracing the strategy to diversify their holdings.】

item.title: 乌拉圭央行意外降息四分之一个百分点
item.description: 乌拉圭央行将基准利率下调了四分之一个百分点，降至 9%，并表示如果通胀率接近目标，可能会进一步降低借贷成本。【原文：Uruguay’s central bank cut its benchmark interest rate by a quarter point to 9% and signaled it might further lower borrowing costs if inflation converges with the target.】

item.title: 苹果公司运营总裁杰夫-威廉姆斯（Jeff Williams）将把职务移交给副手
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc.首席运营官杰夫-威廉姆斯（Jeff Williams）将于本月晚些时候把工作交给副手萨比-汗（Sabih Khan），这标志着这家 iPhone 制造商的重大转型。【原文：Longtime Apple Inc. Chief Operating Officer Jeff Williams will hand off the job to deputy Sabih Khan later this month, marking a major transition for the iPhone maker.】

item.title: 电力公司 AES 在收购兴趣中探索各种选择
item.description: 知情人士透露，为微软公司等科技巨头提供可再生能源的AES公司正在探索各种选择，包括在大型投资公司有意收购的情况下出售。【原文：AES Corp., which provides renewable power to tech giants such as Microsoft Corp., is exploring options including a potential sale amid takeover interest from large investment firms, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 强劲数据推高收益率，国债牛市解除大额押注
item.description: 期货交易者一直在平仓对国债的一些大额看涨押注，在上周出人意料地强劲的就业报告公布后，加剧了近期美国国债收益率的上行压力。【原文：Futures traders have been unwinding some large bullish bets on Treasury bonds, adding to the recent upward pressure on US yields after a surprisingly strong jobs report last week.】

item.title: 美国制裁针对朝鲜假冒技术工人计划
item.description: 美国对与招募朝鲜人冒充美国技术工人并帮助资助金正恩政权的计划有关的个人和公司实施了制裁。【原文：The US slapped sanctions on individuals and companies linked to a scheme that involves recruiting North Koreans to pose as American tech workers and help fund Kim Jong Un’s regime.】

item.title: 铜业大国智利对特朗普征收 50%关税的细节感到担忧
item.description: 智利是迄今为止向美国运输铜的最大国家，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普就关税问题发表重磅言论后，智利正在等待细节的浮出水面。【原文：Chile, by far the biggest shipper of copper into the US, is waiting for details to emerge following President’s Donald Trump’s bombshell comments on tariffs.】

item.title: 南非财政部长提醒不要仓促制定新的通胀目标
item.description: 南非财政部长表示，降低通胀目标的工作 "进展顺利"，但告诫不要仓促做出决定。【原文：South Africa’s finance minister said work on lowering the inflation target is “progressing well” but cautioned against rushing the decision.】

item.title: PitchBook 称风险投资支持的公司将迎来十年来最少的美国 IPO
item.description: 据数据提供商 PitchBook 称，风险投资支持的公司有望成为十年来美国首次公开募股数量最少的公司，尽管股市创下历史新高，但撤资总数仍在继续攀升。【原文：Venture capital-backed companies are on track for the fewest US initial public offerings in a decade, according to data provider PitchBook, even as stock markets hit records and the overall number of divestments continues to climb.】

item.title: 华尔街对财政部重建库房计划的担忧有所缓解
item.description: 在国会提高法定债务限额后，财政部补充现金缓冲的计划目前不太可能扰乱资金市场。【原文：The Treasury’s plan to replenish its cash buffer after Congress raised the statutory debt limit is unlikely to roil funding markets for now.】

item.title: 信贷基金崩溃导致 EY 遭受 10 亿美元诉讼
item.description: Bridging Finance Inc. 的接管人正在起诉 Ernst & Young LLP，索赔 14 亿加元（10 亿美元），称该审计师未能发现导致这家多伦多私人贷款公司倒闭的欺诈和错报。【原文：Bridging Finance Inc.’s receiver is suing Ernst & Young LLP for C$1.4 billion ($1 billion), alleging the auditor failed to detect fraud and misstatements that contributed to the Toronto private lender’s collapse.】

item.title: 银行卡余额下降导致美国消费者债务增速放缓
item.description: 由于信用卡和其他未偿循环债务的回落，5 月份美国消费者借贷增长速度为三个月来最慢。【原文：US consumer borrowing increased in May at the slowest pace in three months on a pullback in credit card and other revolving debt outstanding.】

item.title: 肯沃斯、彼得比尔特制造商在魁北克裁员以应对市场疲软
item.description: 据 Unifor 当地工会发布的消息称，由于需求疲软，肯沃斯（Kenworth）和彼得比尔特（Peterbilt）品牌的母公司、卡车制造商 PACCAR 公司将在其位于魁北克省圣特里斯（Sainte-Therese）的工厂裁员 175 人。【原文：Truck maker PACCAR Inc., parent company of the Kenworth and Peterbilt nameplates, will lay off 175 employees in its Sainte-Therese, Que.-plant over weakening demand, according to a news release sent by a local union of Unifor.】

item.title: Meta 向全球最大眼镜制造商投资 35 亿美元，推动人工智能眼镜发展
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Meta Plaforms 公司收购了全球最大的眼镜制造商 EssilorLuxottica SA 公司的少数股份。【原文：Meta Plaforms Inc. bought a minority stake in the world’s largest eye-wear maker EssilorLuxottica SA, a deal that increases the US tech giant’s financial commitment to the fast-growing smart glasses industry, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Fair Isaac 下跌，因为 Pulte 允许房利美和房地美使用 VantageScore
item.description: 在联邦监管机构表示政府资助的抵押贷款实体房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）将可以在确定借款人信用时使用第二家公司后，Fair Isaac Corp.【原文：Shares in Fair Isaac Corp., known colloquially as FICO, headed for the worst slide since March 2020 after federal regulators said government-sponsored mortgage entities Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac will be able to use a second firm when determining borrowers’ creditworthiness.】

item.title: 南非模拟美国提议的 30% 关税对预算的影响
item.description: 南非国家财政部担心美国提议的 30% 关税会打击税收，并正在模拟其对国家预算可能产生的影响。【原文：South Africa’s National Treasury is worried that the US’s proposed 30% tariff could hit tax revenues and is modeling the impact it may have on the nation’s budget.】
